episodes.title: COS new front group is called "Art Class"
episodes.description:
Believe it or not Scientology has a new front group it's called"Art Class"
Jennifer Sandova went to sign up for an art class and ended up becoming a Scientologist!!! A big thank you to spike for letting me use one of her soundtracks for this video.
This video is very emotional for me because I was not able to shoot it because I ended up in the ER in New York because of exhaustion & 
25 years of back pain took it's toll on me.luckily Colin Henderson stepped up and did the interview for me.
Big thank you to Jennifer Spike and Colin Henderson.

episodes.title: Arnie Lerma "I'd prefer to die speaking my mind than live fearing to speake"
episodes.description: Arnie Lerma has become something of a folk hero in the newsgroup. His statement "I would prefer to die speaking my mind than to live fearing to speak," has become a sort-of mantra among the cult-bashers.

A NY Professor/Scholar was approached by Scientology to do a survey but they would only let him talk to one person? A NY AMON
Talked about protesting.We gave them HELL about the deaths at
Narconon!!!!

episodes.title: Dan Garvin 25 years in the Sea Org what an incredible story.
episodes.description: Brought up in Christian Science to believe the world is imaginary and thoughts, ideas are reality. CS never "worked" for me, Scientology claimed to know why and have the solution. Ended up spending 25 years in the Scientology "Sea Organization" including 10 in OSA, their Legal, PR, and Intelligence branch. Scientology didn't work either. Left in 2001, studied physics and math in college.  Turns out reality is real.

episodes.title: Steven Hassan An internationally recognized authority on cults,
episodes.description: An internationally recognized authority on cults, Steven Hassan has appeared on hundreds of television and radio programs, and is extensively quoted in the media. He lectures frequently at universities and conferences for educators, counselors, religious leaders, and law enforcement personnel. He is a member of the American Association for Counseling and Development, and holds a master's degree in counseling psychology from Cambridge College.

episodes.description: Paulette Cooper is an American author who is best known for her activism against the Church of Scientology and the subsequent harassment she suffered from the Church. Cooper's books have sold close to a half a million copies.

episodes.title: JIM & MESHELL LITTLE ON SP TOUR
episodes.description:
This is a raw footage interview of Jim and Meshell Little from the SP Tour.

Please listen to Jim and Meshell Little as they discuss their views of the Church of Scientology of St Louis, Missouri, and the Scientology front group, Applied Scholastics.
Listen to Meshell as she discussing losing her son, Jeremy, to Scientology after he was forced to disconnect from her, his grandmother, sister, brother, and step-father. To this day Meshell writes a blog to help cope with the loss.
Meshell's blog to Jeremy is: http://MyJeremy.WordPress.com
Jim and Meshell's blog to Scientologist: http://LittleDoubt.WordPress.com
Jim and Meshell's blog to the people of St Louis: http://DoubtFormula.WordPress.com
I would like to thank the Little's for their time and incredible story.

My Son, Jeremy Andrew Powers
myjeremy.wordpress.com

episodes.title: JFK CLIP OF 2009 DOC
episodes.description:
I-35: Heartbreak and Healing on an American Highway
Bert Leahy, an independent videographer, travels with his wife, a teacher, to go behind the headlines several years after the reporters have gone home. How many of us have visited the Oklahoma City Bombing Memorital? What about the Branch Davidian Memorial in Waco? What does the University of Texas have to say to visitors about the Charles Whitman shooting? Is the Luby's in Killeen still standing after the massacre that occured there? These questions and more will be answered in this documentary created by a couple who turned off the t.v., got off the couch, and found out for themselves.

http://www.amazon.com/I-35-Heartbreak-Healing-American-Highway/dp/B002AMUDTY/ref=sr_1_2?s=movies-tv&ie=UTF8&qid=1385176141&sr=1-2&keywords=Bert+Leahy
